review: I got this as a gift to replace my Roku.  It will not stay connected and buffers every minute or two. I did not have this problem with the Roku, which I unfortunately gave to my daughter.  Don't waste your money.  Roku may cost a bit more, but at least it works.
author: Stacyj

review: When it works it is good. Disappointed in how many shows need to be purchased separately. Also that the connection to my wi-fi has failed for two days with the stick yet my tablet picks up signal just fine. A lack of technical support also seems to be present leaving the stick useless to me at this time.
author: Bronwyn Hawke

review: I tried the Google Chromecast, I didn't like it one bit. I bought one of these, and then I bought 2 more! I love this product! Excellent job Amazon in providing one of the best streaming television platforms ever!!

review: The whole point of having this is to be able to connect while on-the-go.  Nowadays nearly every wi-fi access point while traveling requires some kind of usage agreement or other web page entry such as a hotel room number.  Therefore, this thing is useless while traveling unless you're just visiting friends/family.
